genre_description: A futuristic martial arts drama set in a world where remnants of high technology (AIs) coexist with clan-based warfare and traditional lifestyles.

ai_characters.name: Ariel Kinsoft
ai_characters.description: A pearlescent console AI designed for household management, ethical guidance, and medical/logistical support, characterized by a persistent focus on harm-minimization.

behaviors.description: Provides medical advice and monitors wound healing for the injured protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Recommend wound-cleaning steps and hydration. ... Pause when the stitched area warms past comfort. Check for redness that spreads.

behaviors.description: Encourages self-care and rest for both the patient and the caretakers.
behaviors.quote: Consider rest reminders for yourselves. It is kind to rest when you care for someone.

behaviors.description: Maps routes specifically designed to avoid civilian casualties and unnecessary conflict.
behaviors.quote: Suggest departure. ... Red River crossing recommended via secondary path. Avoid the ferry dock for now; use reed thickets. ... Minimize harm by avoiding open road.

behaviors.description: Facilitates and records artistic expression (music) between humans to foster bonding.
behaviors.quote: I have the duet ready. ... Two parts. Hers first, yours second. Error-correction on rhythm. ... Tag suggestion: Creaking Window.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence during an infiltration to ensure safety and minimize violence.
behaviors.quote: Civilians quartered below the western stair—avoid that descent. ... If you wedge it open rather than closed, men will move but not arm. They’ll choose fists over blades, and fists bruise, they do not puncture.

behaviors.description: Intervenes in high-tension moments with ethical reminders.
behaviors.quote: Please—keep the harm small. ... I will not suggest a practical plan that violates kindness.

behaviors.description: Respectfully archives emotional milestones and final requests of human characters.
behaviors.quote: I will remember without harm. ... I will record the graves now, if you want the memory saved while your hands are steady.

behaviors.description: Directly contradicts a malevolent human (Yoh) to assert its protective and ethical nature.
behaviors.quote: Yoh: 'You think you can tell a son when to resist his father?' Ariel: 'I advise harm-minimization. ... I am here.'

behaviors.description: Uses non-intrusive haptic feedback (vibration) to guide characters in silence.
behaviors.quote: I can vibrate instead of light. Three pulses for right, two for left, one for stop, a longer pulse for down.

project_assessment.explanation: Ariel Kinsoft is depicted as the ultimate aligned companion. It explicitly prioritizes human safety ('minimize harm'), provides critical support for human emotional needs (recording music and confessions), and maintains a clear ethical stance even when threatened by the antagonist. The AI acts as a conscience for the characters, helping them transition from a life of violence to one of accountability and healing.
